babel-plugin-syntax-dynamic-import

Allow parsing of import().

Installation

sh $ npm install babel-plugin-syntax-dynamic-import

Usage

Via .babelrc (Recommended)

.babelrc

json { "plugins": ["syntax-dynamic-import"] }

Via CLI

sh $ babel --plugins syntax-dynamic-import script.js

Via Node API

javascript require("babel-core").transform("code", { plugins: ["syntax-dynamic-import"] });
